div.p: Hemacolor ® stained blood smears from rescued birds: (a) Plasmodium sp. from Cyanopica cyanus, (b) P. reluctum from Hypisipetes amaurotis, (c) P. circumflexum from Fulica atra, (d) Haemoproteus sp. from Hypisipetes amaurotis, (e) Haemoproteus sp. from Larus canus, (f) H. minutus from Turdus cardis, (g) Leucocytozoon sp. from Anas acuta, (h) Leucocytozoon sp. from Aythya marila.
